item.title: How to Look Smart in Video Conference Calls
item.description:
How to Look Smart in Video Conference Calls

Believe it or not, you don't always have to feel like an idiot every time you join a video conference call from home. Inherent in this God-awful communication medium are the building blocks of appearing smart. Simply use the expectations of broken technology, lack of transparency, and your colleagues' own personal insecurities, in order to come out on top.
